Control Name: Implements and Maintains Environmental Protection Mechanisms— Management implements and maintains environmental protection mechanisms to prevent and mitigate against environmental events.

control_attributes.Control: Implements and Maintains Environmental Protection Mechanisms— Management implements and maintains environmental protection mechanisms to prevent and mitigate against environmental events.
control_attributes.SubCategory: A1.2 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections, software, data back-up processes, and recovery infrastructure to meet its objectives.
